Package tud.iir.persistence

Class Summary
ConfigFileManager The ConfigFileManager manages a config file.
DatabaseManager The DatabaseManager writes and reads data to the database.
DictionaryDBIndex  
DictionaryFileIndex This class can be used to create, write and read a dictionary index.
DictionaryIndex  
Format A format for an attribute that can be specified in an xml file if xsd data types are not enough.
IndexManager Write and read from the Lucene index.
NGramAnalyzer  
OntologyManager Read and write the ontology.
PersistenceManager The PersistenceManager triggers the DatabaseManager and the OntologyManager.
PredefinedSource Sources can be predefined in an xml file.
